content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-87)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (x=41.0, y=-86.0) with chest at (x=40.5, y=-87.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=39.0, y=-85.0) with chest at (x=39.5, y=-83.5)
- Burner mining drill (x=37.0, y=-85.0) with chest at (x=36.5, y=-86.5)
- Burner inserters at (x=35.5, y=-86.5) and (x=35.5, y=-85.5) moving coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (x=-28.0, y=-61.0) mining iron/copper ore
- Stone furnace (x=-27.0, y=-58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest (x=-27.5, y=-59.5) storing ore
- Burner inserter (x=-26.5, y=-59.5) moving items
- Additional furnaces at (x=-23.0, y=-58.0), (x=-21.0, y=-58.0)
- Output chest (x=-24.5, y=-58.5) storing plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at (x=-10.0, y=-59.0), (x=-8.0, y=-59.0), (x=-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for item movement
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Array at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- Four stone furnaces at (x=0.0, y=0.0), (x=2.0, y=0.0), (x=4.0, y=0.0), (x=6.0, y=0.0)
- Input chests at (x=0.5, y=-2.5), (x=2.5, y=-2.5), (x=4.5, y=-2.5), (x=6.5, y=-2.5)
- Output chests at (x=0.5, y=2.5), (x=2.5, y=2.5), (x=4.5, y=2.5), (x=6.5, y=2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving items between components

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Boiler at (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Steam engine at (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting more than available
- Check available quantity before attempting to extract large amounts from chests
- Extract in smaller batches if unsure of exact quantities

### Errors with inserter placement and operation
- Ensure proper alignment between inserter pickup and drop positions
- Check that destination has space before inserter attempts to move items
- Verify inserters have fuel and proper orientation

### Transport belt related errors
- Clear blocked belts to allow item flow
- Ensure proper connection between belt segments
- Check belt direction matches intended item flow
